title: Kamailio Inspector
description:
# Kamailio Inspector Dashboard

Use this dashboard to analyze your Kamailio deployment. It shows a detailed snapshot of the health and performance of your Kamailio server at a quick glance. Use the `host` variable to select a host to inspect.  

With the Kamailio Inspector Dashboard you can:
- see overall system health at a glance
- track network traffic and load on your server
- visualize and determine performance gaps in your route configurations
- identify malfunctioning carriers or endpoints
- identify bad actors and malicious traffic
- monitor the status of various modules loaded in Kamailio
- identify possible performance improvements for your environment

For more information about Kamailio see the [Kamailio Documentation][1].  
For tips, tricks, tools, and to buy us a coffee, see the [dOpenSource Website][2].  

[1]: https://www.kamailio.org/w/documentation/
[2]: https://dopensource.com/
